text: Ishan Uday is a special scholarship scheme by UGC, Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India with a provision to grant 10,000 scholarships to students from the Northeast, whose parental income is below Rs 4.5 lakh per annum.Highlights of New Initiatives Taken by the Ministry of HRD The scholarship ranges from Rs 5,400 to 8,400 per month for studying at undergraduate level in colleges and universities in India. == References == Category:Ministry of Education (India) Category:Scholarships in India
title: Ishan Uday
